statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount, order_date FROM CustomerOrders WHERE order_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, customer_id FROM CustomerOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, shipping_address FROM CustomerOrders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC, total_amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM CustomerOrders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(total_amount) > 1000
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM CustomerOrders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(order_id) >= 5
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders WHERE shipping_address LIKE '%Ave%'
SELECT * FROM Orders
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 1001
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Payments
SELECT payment_id, order_id, payment_amount FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT order_id, payment_amount FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount < 500 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Orders JOIN Payments ON Orders.order_id = Payments.order_id WHERE payment_amount > total_amount;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 2;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE customer_id = '12345'
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM customer_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT order_id, shipping_address FROM shipping_info WHERE status = 'Delivered'
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM customer_orders JOIN payments ON customer_orders.order_id = payments.order_id
SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customer_orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000;
SELECT order_id, payment_date, amount FROM payments WHERE amount < 50 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT order_id, shipping_address, status FROM shipping_info WHERE status = 'Shipped' ORDER BY order_id;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM customer_orders WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT shipping_id, shipping_date, tracking_number FROM shipping ORDER BY shipping_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT p.payment_id, o.order_id, p.payment_date, p.amount FROM payments p JOIN orders o ON p.order_id = o.order_id;
SELECT s.shipping_id, o.order_id, s.shipping_date, s.tracking_number FROM shipping s JOIN orders o ON s.order_id = o.order_id;
SELECT * FROM orders
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE price > 50
SELECT payment_id, order_id, amount FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount < 1000
SELECT * FROM orders
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT orders.order_id, customers.customer_name, orders.total_amount FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE orders.total_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < 50 ORDER BY price ASC
